A package with functions to generate fractals. It is intended to be use for educational purposes.

## Install

To install `chaos`:

```
devtools::install_github("ddiez/chaos")
```


## Usage

Plot the logitic map.

```{r logmap}
library(chaos)
library(ggplot2)
x <- logmap(2, 4)
plot(x) + theme_void()
```

Plot the mandelbrot set.

```{r madelbrot}
z <- mandelbrot(steps = 300)
plot_mandelbrot(z)
```
